pageContext._xxxcollectionTitlextxt: Federal Theatre Project Playscript and Radioscript Collection
pageContext._xxxcollectionDescriptionxtxt: Contains over 200 playscripts and radioscripts, written and performed between 1936-1939 for the Federal Theatre Project. Many of the scripts have been annotated with additional theatrical instructions, corrections and textual changes. Also includes copies of 62 programs and handbills.
